reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute and classy, adding style to cold days, and appreciate its quality, comfort, and softness. They consider it worth the price. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it nice while others say it runs large, and the material quality and color also get mixed reviews.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Love it. I get compliments every time I wear it tell me it's the right color looks so good on your neck your shoulders sticking out look pretty oh yeah I recommend this sweater to everyone seriously it's so cool. Read more
items.author: Susan B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must buy!
items.body: Nice fit, it’s comfortable and cute. Read more
items.author: Kay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: Great sweater - runs big but the color is a nice off white not a bad price - Read more
items.author: kathleen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great look runs big
items.body: I am a petite person so this is definitely a very loose fit! The materials is soft and feels nice on your skin but the very loose fit make it look a bit awkward. The only reason I give 4 stars is the sizing, other than that is a great buy! Read more
items.author: Kalinka

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy, Elegant and Soft
items.body: I love the style of this sweater and the way it fits. I went with my regular size according to the size chart after reading the reviews. It isn’t a form fitting sweater but it’s not a baggy sweater… just slightly loose fitting and stretchy. I’m 5’ 6” and 145 lbs so I ordered a Medium and it fits perfectly. The shoulder cutouts make this look very elegant. I ordered the Burgundy color and it is perfect for the holidays and looks just like the photo. This sweater is very dressy looking but will also go well with a nice pair of jeans or leggings. Very good quality and worth the price but I got mine during a lightening deal. I highly recommend this sweater. Read more
items.author: Julia L. Gilfoyle

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bizarre construction
items.body: All the fabric pools under your pits and arms! This is so bizarre. The fabric is so soft and comfortable but the fit is crazy. Maybe if a lady has a size H bust size and can fill out some of that underarm fabric it will work, but even for my DDD it doesn't adjust properly. In any case, it does not fit me or my friend who also tried it anything like the photo shows. Read more
items.author: RD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great find to add to your collection
items.body: This top is really nice. I could wear this at work or after work. It’s good with the knitting is a good quality. I’m not disappointed as soft and what you see is what you’re getting. I got it in a medium, so it doesn’t fit too snug or too loose it’s just perfect Great addition. Read more
items.author: Michelle Frazier

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Runs So Big!!!!!
items.body: A small is like an X-Large. So big. Beautiful sweater sadly I must return. Read more
items.author: pam alves

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, White, Beige, Blue, Yellow, Burgundy, Army Green, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
